channel.title: Biz-Eye.com: Get Email Notifications When Your Online Business's Reputation Changes
channel.description:
I've been struggling to launch in the past year, so I finally got myself to create a simple page, explaining the service.
I'd love to know what you guys think about my idea. Would you use it? If yes, please sign up :) Otherwise, why wouldn't you?
Any feedback is welcomed!
[www.biz-eye.com][1]
[1]: https://www.biz-eye.com
